contentrichtext.text: {{Use dmy dates|date=February 2012}} {{Infobox film | name = L'Année des méduses | image = Année des méduses poster.jpg | director = [[Christopher Frank]] | writer = [[Christopher Frank]] | starring = [[Bernard Giraudeau]]<br>[[Valérie Kaprisky]]<br>[[Caroline Cellier]]<br>[[Jacques Perrin]] | producer = [[Alain Terzian]] | music = [[Nina Hagen]]<br>[[Alain Wisniak]] | cinematography = Renato Berta | distributor = [[European Classics Video]] | released = 14 November 1984 (French release)<br>24 April 1987 (U.S. release) | runtime = 110 min. | language = French }} '''''L'année des méduses''''' ('''''The Year of the Jellyfish''''') is a French drama film inspired by a novel by [[:fr:Christopher Frank|Christopher Frank]], directed by Frank himself with [[Valérie Kaprisky]] and [[Bernard Giraudeau]]. The film had a total of 1,554,641 admissions in France where it was the 23rd highest grossing film of the year.<ref name="JPBox Office">http://www.jpbox-office.com/fichfilm.php?id=6623</ref> == Plot == Chris, a sexy teenager who appears mostly bare-breasted on the French Riviera, has a crush on Romain, her mother's lover. In reaction to her inability to attract his attention, she experiments with other risque affairs. == Awards and nominations == *'''[[César Awards]]''' (France) **'''Won''': [[César Award for Best Supporting Actress|Best Actress – Supporting Role]] (Caroline Cellier) ==References== {{reflist|colwidth=30em}} == External links == * {{imdb title|id=0086902|title=L'Année des méduses}} * {{Amg movie|27799|L'Année des méduses}} [[Category:French films]] [[Category:1984 films]] [[Category:Films based on French novels]] {{1980s-France-film-stub}}
